channel.title: Can only click 1 time before client crashes
channel.description:
Need help with this. I can click 1 time and 1 time only until my client crashes. If I click a second time then my client crashes. Not the server...
I run it on my brothers computer same client and server copied from a flash drive to his and it works just fine.
The problem is I don't want to host a server on his computer because mine is really good. More than capable enough to host about 200 people.
I think it is because I'm running Windows Vista Ultimate 64-bit Edition.
Here is specs:
AMD| Phenom X4 9950 Processor @ 2.6Ghz PSU| Antec Earthwatts 650 Watt (80% more Effecient) =] OS| Windows Vista Ultimate 64-bit Edition GFX| ATI Radeon HD 4870 1GB GDDR5
My computer rating is a 5.9 and people who know the Vista rating system, that is as high as it goes. Kinda like a 10/10.

item.title: Can only click 1 time before client crashes
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

most clients arent compatable with 64 bits

Read full topic

item.title: Can only click 1 time before client crashes
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

Something may be wrong with your client, try using another client, because some servers have items and areas unavailable to the clent.

Read full topic
